Texts.Eng: The Vanguard are eager to study and replicate the Matter Manipulator you retrieved from the Protectorate, but they need some materials. ^green;I'm assigning you with retrieving ^orange;20 Manipulator Modules ^green;so that the Vanguard can start replicating the device. ^reset;You'll be rewarded for it too, of course.

Well done, Captain. I will have my Watchers bring these to the Vanguard. In the mean time, they built you a new casing for your own Matter Manipulator - one more befitting of a Captain of the Nomada. Enjoy it, Captain.
